title: Novel Electron Gun Design Using a Virtual Source Mode of Thermionic LaB6
content: An electron gun is a crucial component for an electron beam-based equipment, such as electron microscope, electron beam lithography and electron beam welding, etc. In particular, electron microscopy requires electron guns with higher angular current density(JÎ©) and narrower energy distribution, as they can provide brighter images and shorter data acquisition times in the low-acceleration energy region of the electron beam. Therefore, Schottky-emitter electron gun has been widely used in advanced electron microscope due to its good properties.
